title: Meschain
para1: Meschain aims to solve the major problem with Messaging Apps, Privacy. It is designed on top of blockchain network powered by users with XSalsa20 based public-key authenticated Encryption.
para2: Everything is encrypted by default and decentralised to the user level. With just a browser anyone can use this selfless messenger.
shortDesc: Meschain takes the whole texting experience from central level to blockchain, using modern Web Standards for making a more private internet.
